pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister David Cameron of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Prime Minister David Cameron during a bilateral visit to London. They discussed the deep and enduring bonds that exist between their two countries and emphasized areas for strengthened collaboration, including on climate change.

They also discussed a number of important bilateral and international issues, such as trade and security, including the fight against ISIL.

The two leaders agreed to engage in regular dialogue on the many and varied interests shared by Canada and the United Kingdom.
